full_text:
Hey Frank,

My name is Monty Crawford, I'm the son in law to Marcus Leader, whom is
friends with Carly Rose ... whom has shown me the box(s) that you made for
her.

I am curious as to what i need to do to get one of these boxes for research
... we are setting up a book and want to include "franks box" not the radio
shack version of the box that can be made ...

If this is something you can do, please let me know.
